title: The Sun Also Sets
description: The long-running soap opera full of love triangles, betrayal, medical miracles, secret families, and more!
quote: I am guilty! Guilty of love in the first degree.
altHero: Celeste Talbert as Maggie and Jeffrey Anderson as Dr. Rod Randall
alt1: Maggie holding her kid’s head emotionally
alt2: Blair Brennan as Bolt in a tank top, at Maggie’s hospital bed
alt3: Maggie, Dr. Randall, and Angelique (played by Lori Craven)
alt4: Dr. Randall with Nurse Nan (played by Montana Moorehead)
